mapper.insert: insert into board(boardnum, boardwriter, boardtitle, boardcontent, boardcnt) values(board_seq.nextval,#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},0)
mapper.select: select boardnum, boardtitle, boardwriter, boardcnt, to_char(boarddate,'yyyy-MM-dd')boarddate from board order by boardnum desc
select boardtitle, boardwriter, boardcontent, boardcnt, to_char(boarddate,'yyyy-MM-dd')boarddate from board where boardnum = #{param1}
mapper.update: update board set boardcnt = boardcnt+1 where boardnum = #{param}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn,A.* from( select boardnum, boardtitle, boardwriter, boardcnt, to_char(boarddate,'yyyy-MM-dd')boarddate from BOARD order by boardnum DESC)A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into comments(commentnum, boardnum, commentcontent) values(comment_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2})
